entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [monointerpreter] Array Set function doesn't validate matching element types on mono interpreter #107110
  • Attributes.GetCustomAttributesOnOpenGenericBaseTypeRetrievesDerivedAttributes test still fails on Mono #107095
  • [API Proposal]: CancellationToken.UnsafeRegisterWithoutImmediateInvoke #107094
    Future
  • Potentially missing await of requestBodyTask in Http2Connection #107082
    Future
  • JIT: We should be able to avoid covariance checks when inlining with exact types #107080
    10.0.0
  • SPMI: Update AzureKeyVault task #107078
    10.0.0
  • `ReaderWriterLockSlim.WaitingWriteCount` returns 0 if the write lock is entering as an upgrade from `UpgradableReadLock` #107077
    10.0.0
  • Switch recognition should not be lexical #107076
    10.0.0
  • Crash on reentry of tiered compilation #107074
  • [WASI] implement finalizer #107071
    10.0.0
  • [Question] Any plan to use roslyn source generator to make `EventSource` and `ActivitySource` easily? #107069
  • Test failure: profiler/handles/handles/handles.sh #107067
  • JsonSerializerOptions.RespectRequiredConstructorParameters still calls constructor with invalid values #107065
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Drop support for .NET Standard #107081
  • FreeBSD tests crash with HRESULT: 0x8007FF02 from #106724 #106892
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 6/3/2024 10:30:18 PM #103296
    9.0.0
  • Invalid Environment.ProcessorCount on AMD EPYC 9554. Shows 64 instead of 128 #106642
  • Audit OOB packages for trimming #107111
  • Why is it not supported on mono to set the value of function pointer through reflection #107070
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.UseWindowsServiceTests.CanCreateService #103548
    10.0.0
  • IndexOutOfRangeException thrown by NullabilityInfoContext.Create(PropertyInfo) #107033
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/TieredCompilation/BasicTestWithMcj/BasicTestWithMcj.cmd #106949
    10.0.0
  • Upgrade native brotli to version 1.0.10 #106887
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 17 Regressions on 8/16/2024 4:29:39 PM #106707
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed `supportedInstructionSet.HasInstructionSet(InstructionSet.X64_AVX512F_VL)` #106450
    10.0.0
  • Bad error message when DOTNET_ROOT is set to x86 install of dotnet #3745
    Future
  • Backport GH105344 to .NET 8 #107088
    8.0.x
  • DateTime AddUnits & TimeSpan IntervalFromDoubleTicks rounding issues #107092
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Stream APIs - GetDirectSpan & ReadDirectSpan #107090
    Future
  • App Exception/Crashes Due to Windows Update #106829
  • JIT: Bad codegen with `AdvSimd.Insert` #106079
    9.0.0
  • Need to add logging mechanism to CompilationLibrary.ResolveReferencePaths #2979
    Future
  • [Question] Why the `Unsafe.SkipInit(out T)` is slowly than `T t = default`? #107068
  • MemoryMappedFile.CreateNew is 12-4 times slower on Linux compared to Windows #31272
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests.NumberHandlingTests_Default.Number_AsRootType_RoundTrip #106947
    9.0.0
  • ThreadPool.CompletedWorkItemCount double counting IO completion work items #104284
    10.0.0
  • Divergent behavior of byte `&` operator #107062

PullRequests

Created

  • Change BuildWithFactoryReadDirect to not use RSA+MD5 #107119
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Use merged runners for ios tests #107118
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Convert stream override checks to `QCall` #107117
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Let the debugger knows DATAS is on #107115
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] pal init: Move InitializeFlushProcessWriteBuffers() after VIRTUALInitialize() #107114
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Handle exceptional cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    area-Interop-mono
  • Fix RidAssetResolution test to open shared framework file with read share access #107112
    area-Host
  • [release/9.0] Extend timeout when waiting for service status #107109
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Make sure we can build with DYNAMIC_HEAP_COUNT not defined #107108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Update AnyAll.cs (Add AnyAndNotNull Extension Methods) #107107
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Remove `BaseDomain::CreateSizedRefHandle` #107106
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Add ObsoleteAttribute and EditorBrowsable(Never) to DynamicDependency.Condition #107104
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Upgrade vendored Brotli dependency to v1.1.0 #107103
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [release/9.0] Upgrade vendored Brotli dependency to v1.1.0 #107102
    area-System.IO.Compression, 9.0.0
  • Update docs about units for SizeLimit #107101
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • JIT: Use `ValueTuple` argument for SIMD type lookup for `AdvSimd.Store*` #107099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Give `Compiler` a proper constructor #107098
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Tensor Operation fixes when input is sliced (non-contiguous) #107097
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [WASI] finalizer + HTTP client child resources #107096
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix storage of stack trace of exception from reflection #107093
    Servicing-approved, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #107089
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Use OpenSSL 3's HKDF if it is available #107085
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow SVE ops to re-use the same registers #107084
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Ensure required properties are validated before invoking the deserialization constructor. #107083
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • WIP: [mono][tvos] Do not treat assembly.pdb/xml files as native files to bundle when AOTing on Helix #107079
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • [release/9.0] Ensure the layout of `StackAllocatedBox<T>` matches boxed layouts #107075
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr
  • unnecessary assert when GetHeap is called in wait_for_gc_done #107073
    area-GC-coreclr

Merged

  • Propagate RuntimeConfiguration for cross-subset builds #107049
    area-Infrastructure
  • Code cleanup: Remove TODO to support genRetrunBB != nullptr #107087
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • pal init: Move InitializeFlushProcessWriteBuffers() after VIRTUALInitialize() #107100
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark NoBackwardTimeZones as ConditionalFact #107086
    area-System.Runtime
  • Upgrade vendored Brotli dependency to v1.1.0 #106994
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Extend timeout when waiting for service status #106998
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • Minor changes to make it easier to sync diagnostic repo copy #107066
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update NativeImageEagerFixups lock acquiredbefore #107064
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move exposed assembly object and dynamic method table out of `DomainAssembly` #106911
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • ILLink: fix TypeProxy implementation of equality #106990
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable all AVX-512 ISA's in Crossgen2 and ILC When Supported #106792
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Make host error message include pointer to architecture for Windows library load failure with ERROR_BAD_EXE_FORMAT #107063
    area-Host
  • [WASI] WasiEventLoop to keep Task alive #106633
    arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono, os-wasi, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Performance sample - remove public nugets and clean up #107030
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix copying ephemeral keys to keychains #106993
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, os-macos-sequoia (macOS15), 9.0.0
  • Ensure that AdvSimd.Insert doesn't zero out the upper bits #106981
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JIT/SPMI CodeQL issues #107056
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure the layout of `StackAllocatedBox<T>` matches boxed layouts #107050
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup VARIANT marshalling and convert to managed #102498
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Stop counting work items from ThreadPoolTypedWorkItemQueue for ThreadPool.CompletedWorkItemCount #106854
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/9.0] Backport Azure Linux test changes #106980
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] New cert loader should load into CNG by default #107060
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport Azure Linux test changes #107061
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Azure 3.0 helix test #106330
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Respect JitEnableOptionalRelocs in TryReserveInitialMemory #107059
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Remove Helper Method Frames from debugdebugger #107058
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Split identifier calculation from code context and bind marshallers to the code context #106846
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Upgrade zlib-ng to 2.2.1 #105771
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Target .NET 10 / net10.0 #106599
    area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unused custom marshaler code and move ICustomMarshaler and Color marshalling handling to managed code #106735
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Define a merged runner for the nativeaot subtree and run every test out-of-proc and don't reference the xunit generator #107002
    test-enhancement, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 10.0.0
  • Fixes hang in WinUI apps published to AOT #104583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove ArrayClass::m_ElementType - get type from the type handle on MethodTable #106787
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add a public test version of the superpmi-collect pipeline #106960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't use WeakReferences in the BF round trip test #106967
    area-System.Resources, test-enhancement, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds test on Alpine #107035
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, test-bug, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0][no-merge][testing][Android] Run runtime and libraries tests on different Android API version #106951
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix up docs #106563
    area-Meta
  • [release/8.0-staging][infra][android] Fix Android helix queue name #107023
    Servicing-consider, os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Don't keep members of pointer or byref element types #106215
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NRBF] Address issues discovered by Threat Model #106629
    new-api-needs-documentation, binaryformatter-migration, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Tensor Operation fixes when input is sliced (non-contiguous) #106985
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix bug in validating unused bits #106771
    area-System.Memory
  • Added additional tests for generic attributes. #106745
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Correct lengths of Chinese lunisolar calendar months 8 and 9 in 2057. #107038
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2526098 #106995
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Introducing new event for failed http requests #106284 #106964
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, community-contribution
  • Revert Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106965
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Delay free all ops within conditional select #107036
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Clean emsdk setup #106403
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Update System.Net.* unit tests to react to SYSLIB0057 obsoletion #104487
    area-System.Net, test-enhancement
  • Disable event source in mobile sample apps #106880
    test-enhancement, os-android, area-VM-meta-mono, os-ios, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Allow side-effects for the first test in switch recognition #106988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [GC] Handle growing global_regions_to_decommit lists #106168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] Fix processing of satellite assemblies from referenced assembly during publish #106696
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Verify Apple mobile platforms on iOS 17 and XCode 15 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • Generic Enumerable.Range method #106925
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure that Vector128.CreateSequence works on x86 for non-constant 64-bit inputs #107053
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Invalid Release code generation for `wasi-wasm` #2671

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Update documentation #2675
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Move thread stack top and bottom from thread locals to `thread` class #2672
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove WASI Linux from the official build matrix #2674
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable the official build for Linux #2673
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SDK commands like `restore` `build` and `list` incorrectly warn about vulnerable NuGet packages hoisted by the shared runtime #43063
  • Dotnet format should take a single file #43056
  • Daily build: blazor-wasm project build fails on NU1102: Unable to find package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly with version (>= 9.0.0-rc.2.24426.2) #43050
  • Daily build: microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm is not found while installing MAUI workload on .NET 9 #43049

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK]With NET 9 RC1 SDK installed, “Android-35” is missing in the output of "dotnet workload search" after installing workload. #43051
  • `dotnet tool update` skips NuGet package signature verification #37469
    8.0.4xx
  • dotnet tool has a verbosity mode but it isn't silent in mode "quiet" #35173
    9.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport: add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools (#39268) #43060
    untriaged, Area-Tools, DO NOT MERGE, Backport when open, 9.0.2xx
  • Handle --list-tests in dotnet test #43058
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43052
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools #43045
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx

Merged

  • Revert disabling the toolset package in Helix #42860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit workload restore to work with new global.json #42606
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools, Backport when open
  • Add net10.0 known framework references #42969
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [Static web assets] Reduce allocations on DefineStaticWebAssetEndpoints #43038
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable --source for global/path tool install #42965
    untriaged, Area-Tools, 9.0.1xx
  • Send "workload set not installed" messages #42683
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 9.0.1xx
  • Enable workload search for users to find latest set versions #42652
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 9.0.1xx
  • Temporary fix for the cppcli tests #42811
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add PGO for F# compiler #42514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Android workload manifests to SB .NET SDK #42125
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload set garbage collection #42475
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'main' #43042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • fix: Don't fail metadata updates on missing assemblies #40725
    untriaged
  • Add code to containers check to allow users to silence it #42501
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Warn when enabling Windows.UI.Xaml profile for Windows SDK projections #43039
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • `field` keyword nullability #8360

Updated

  • ref ternary operator nullability suppressions #8379

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API proposal] Syntax changes for `field` keyword #74937
  • Offer "Use collection expressions" when the chosen overload would switch #74931

Closed

  • Upgrade to .NET 9 SDK #71084
  • Anonymous-Params-delegate is generated incorrectly with AllowRefStructFlag #74823
    17.12
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35227.116 #74928
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35227.127 #74927
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35227.190 #74926

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to the real System.ValueTuple ref #74936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'use collection expression' to support cases where switching to a collection expr will pick a ROS overload over an array one. #74934
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Added LSP support for document color requests #74933
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74935
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add LSP handler for copilot related documents #74918
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Simplify equivalence comparers #74932
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Always take ownership from UIThreadContext when rename commit #74889
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix copilot options default value handling #74867
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add tests validating a particular scenario #74921
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Avoid synthesizing incorrect `allows ref struct` delegate type parameters #74914
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces, Next
  • Initial work to create a service for returning related documents for copilot purposes. #74906
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #74929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix broken url #74924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #74925
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Async rename commit #74794
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Field-backed properties: readonly backing field #74922
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use collection expressions #74920
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix reference finding for tuple fields and anonymous type properties #69804
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make semantic APIs return more consistent results for `new T()` expressions #74675
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add `IAnalyzerAssemblyResolver` public API #74820
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Handle infinite cycles through params collection initializers #74899
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow ref enumerators in async/iterator methods #74800
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async
  • Optimize single spread collection expression for `List<T>` #74769
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Add required `--locale` option to BuildHost #74910
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Kestrel Metrics can crash local test run #57579
  • Perf regression: plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #57578
  • Perf improvement: json #57577
  • Trace id confused with traceparent from http context in ProblemDetails Extensions? #57576
  • Regarding the Blazor <InputSelect> @bind-value and @onchange event handler #57575
  • Content Section content not rendered on client if you turn off pre-rendering of the Interactive Server page #57574
  • Missing IServiceProvider in ObjectGraphDataAnnotationsValidator #57573
    Backlog
  • Route constraints invoked for paths which do not use the route constraint #57572
  • Visual Studio 17.10.6 is causing runtime error - typeError: Promise constructor cannot be invoked without "new" #57571
  • Multiple Unhandled Exceptions thrown in statics.teams file #57569
  • Quarantine ProcessAsync_AwaitersUseTheResultOfExecutor #57567
  • Discrepancy between SignalRConnectionInfo & object that is needed for the @microsoft/signalr lib #57566
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.dll file version downgrade between 8.0.7 and 8.0.8 #57563
  • Processing errors adds duplicate error.type diagnostic tags to kestrel.connection.duration in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel #57558

Closed

  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.EventTest.Cancel_CanTrigger #52783
    9.0-rc2
  • How to set prerender on all client WASM portion of a Blazor Web App #57532
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.FormHandlingTests.FormWithParentBindingContextTest.EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry` #54757
    9.0-rc2
  • Perf improvement: caching, json_middleware, single_query #57549
  • Perf improvement: endpoint, fortunes_ef #57501
  • BlazorWebJsInitializersTest don't run #54367
    9.0-rc2
  • Published size regression: basicgrpcvanilla, basicminimalapivanilla, todosapivanilla #57550
  • Published size regression: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #57562
  • Regarding the Blazor <InputSelect> @bind-value and @onchange event handler #57570
  • [9.0.100-rc.2.24423.15] StaticWebAssets SDK - Conflicting assets in the same target path #57512
  • I would like to ask if I can provide a WPF blazor Webapp application template #57541
  • Perf regression: json, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #57543
  • [Blazor] Dynamically Load Library Like Mvc #57530
  • [Blazor] Improve StreamRender diffing and DOM change detection #57523

PullRequests

Created

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI` package README #57580
    area-identity
  • Quarantine ProcessAsync_AwaitersUseTheResultOfExecutor #57568
    area-mvc
  • Feature/httpendpoint #57565
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57561
    area-networking
  • Verify project template dependencies #57560
    area-mvc
  • Update Router.cs #57559
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Unquarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.EventTest.Cancel_CanTrigger` #57555
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Diagnostics.EntityFramework` package README #57540
    area-networking, area-middleware, 10.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine EnhancedFormThatCallsNavigationManagerRefreshDoesNotPushHistoryEntry #57376
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix `InjectedStartup_DefaultApplicationNameIsEntryAssembly` #57554
    area-hosting, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix `BlazorWebJsInitializersTest` #57548
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview1
  • Retry `ComponentLifecycleMethodThrowsExceptionTerminatesTheCircuit` #57552
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Provide `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore` package README #57537
    area-identity
  • Fix typo in `RemoteUserAccount` triple slash #57443
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Invoke inbound activity handlers on circuit initialization #57557
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Fix Android CarouselView so you don't need to add a delay after switching ItemSources to Set Position #24499
    Backlog
  • HybridWebView: browser dev tools not working #24497
  • Picker to Entry selections causes keyboard to cover low inputs #24496
  • Custom Control ItemTemplate fails to change at runtime in MAUI iOS #24492
  • WebAuthenticatorResult fails in release mode "Newtonsoft.Json.JsonSerializationException: A member with the name '' already exists on 'Microsoft.Maui.Authentication.WebAuthenticatorResult'. Use the JsonPropertyAttribute to specify another name." #24491
  • [net9.0] Mac TitleBar implementation #24489
    9.0-rc2
  • [Windows, 9.0 Preview 7] Every quit and exit method throws an exception #24486
    9.0-rc2
  • Calendar Icon not shown in android phone. #24483
  • [Windows] CarouselView has issues with the initial rendering of items and doesn't scroll to the correct position when Loop is enabled #24482

Closed

  • [MAUI] From 'Edit recipe' to return to the Recipe details, the 'Ingredients' & 'Recipe' contents appear blank. #24434
    .NET 8 SR9
  • [Android] CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled #17283
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Propagate Measured Changed calls up the xplat hierarchy #22978
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Adding/Removing layout children does not invalidate measures #20181
    Backlog
  • iOS: CollectionView items don't change their size when item content size is changed #15177
    Backlog
  • Trim warnings when publishing `dotnet new maui` #24062
    9.0-rc2
  • Look at wiring ShellContent Pages into the life cycle of container registration #5686
    9.0-preview7
  • Add hooks to disconnect/connect a PlatformView from a Handler in order to avoid memory leaks #16332
    9.0-preview7
  • Moving Items between groups of a Grouped CollectionView in Android throws a IndexOutOfBoundsException #23138
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Moving items in grouped CollectionView is moving the wrong items #21698
    Backlog
  • Moving one item between groups of a Grouped CollectionView results in the temporary fading out of two items instead of one on Android #23152
    .NET 8 SR9
  • Issue with iOS Application Icon: App Store Publishing Failed - AppIcon Missing (Asset Validation Error) #24300

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve Android device type check to use screen size #24495
  • [Testing]Changed Scroll to 12, added comment #24494
    area-testing
  • [xamlc] return early in `NodeILExtensions` for `ValidateOnly` #24493
    area-xaml
  • Remove netPrevious TFMs from RC/GA #24488
    area-infrastructure
  • Resolved Text Jump Issue in Entry Control with HorizontalTextAlignment Set to End #24485
    community ✨, area-controls-entry

Merged

  • Remove code from iOS that short circuits propagation #24477
    area-navigation
  • [Android] Fix for the CarouselView doesn't scroll to the right Position after changing the ItemSource with Loop enabled. #24431
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Make `MeasureInvalidated` event work correctly #23052
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1][macios] Bump to the latest macios 9.0 RC1 #24487
  • [Binding SG] Refactor data models #24462
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Fix item fading when moving between groups in Grouped CollectionView #24461
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update net9 arcade bits #24473
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0.1xx-rc1] Bump macios bits #24481

Updated

  • UI testing doc changes #24165
    area-docs
  • Revert "[ios] fix memory leak in CollectionView cells (#15831)" #24310
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix for FlexLayout padding issue #24195
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [iOS] SwipeView: Fix reenabling parent scrolling after cancelled swipe #23442
    community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • [Android] Map FlowDirection of shell to PlatformView on Android #23473
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-entry, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fix cake script to generate screenshots locally #24319
    area-testing
  • add mapper for IsSwipePagingEnabledProperty on Android #24322
    area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fixed the label text from being cut off from the top when the specified LineHeight. #24273
    community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Move HybridWebView platform code to handlers #24479
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • Fix "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property #24325
    community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Migrate iOS from NavigationRenderer to NavigationViewHandler #20759
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • [Binding SG] Clean up #23714
    area-xaml
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Entry/Editor completed event is not triggered properly when unfocused #24207
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, area-controls-editor
  • Fix border lagging and unwanted animations on iOS #24360
    area-drawing, community ✨
  • Update FlyoutViewHandler.Android.cs #24394
    community ✨, area-controls-flyout

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Stop using MakeGenericMethod in our custom LINQ operators #34559
    Backlog
  • Apply early SqlExpression optimizations (e.g. x AND true -> x) in VisitChildren #34556
    Backlog
  • Adding a stored procedure using raw SQL and then generating an idempotent migration script results in flawed SQL script #34555
  • Use the JSON `id` property directly if the mapped property is already converted to a string #34554
  • Move F# query translation support from EFCore.FSharp into EF #34552
    Backlog
  • EFCore 9 preview 7 - 'Specify caching for sequences' support has been removed #34551
  • Add PrecompileQueries and NativeAot switches to Optimize-DbContext #34550
    Backlog
  • Store Types not documented. #34549

Closed

  • EF Core 8.0.7 'HasTrigger' DbUpdateException #34558
  • Cosmos query does not extract and use partial hierarchical partition key #34553
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Properly implement support for Cosmos hierarchical partition keys #34560
    tell-mode

Merged

  • Properly implement support for Cosmos hierarchical partition keys #34557

Updated

  • (RC2) Downgrade to LTS SqlClient #34540
    tell-mode
